channel.title: CVE Feed for Barracuda -- all

item.title: CVE-2019-5648|2024-08-04T20:01:52.000Z -- barracuda -- load%20balancer%20adc
item.description: Authenticated, administrative access to a Barracuda Load Balancer ADC running unpatched firmware <= v6.4 allows one to edit the LDAP service configuration of the balancer and change the LDAP server to an attacker-controlled system, without having to re-enter LDAP credentials. These steps can be used by any authenticated administrative user to expose the LDAP credentials configured in the LDAP connector over the network.
